about_the_game:
"The Last Light" is an atmospheric puzzle-platformer set in the early 1980s Pacific Northwest. Combining visual storytelling with childhood nostalgia, players embark on a journey to reunite an 11-year old boy with his family.

You step into the shoes of an 11-year-old, and find yourself in a world forever changed by the arrival of supernatural creatures. After the invasion, you are separated from your family, and must summon every ounce of courage to reunite with them in this dangerous, post-apocalyptic landscape.

Puzzles
Encounter a series of challenges that test your wit, reflexes, and problem-solving skills.

Environments
Explore treacherous caves, mist-filled forests, and abandoned towns.

Nostalgic Setting
The game takes place in the early 1980’s rural suburbs, creating a strong sense of nostalgia for players who remember that era and offers a unique historical setting for those who don’t.
